function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy use in buildings, impacting the environment and resources","Impact":"Increased environmental impact and resource depletion","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient facilities and conduct further monitoring and evaluations","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, occupancy sensors, building automation systems","People":"Occupants, facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities"},{"Description":"Possible waste patterns in energy use during diminished occupancy","Impact":"Increased resource waste and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Conduct further monitoring and evaluations, identify and address waste patterns, implement energy-saving measures","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, energy management systems, building automation systems","People":"Occupants, facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of occupant presence and actions (OPA) on total energy use in buildings","Impact":"Inefficient energy use and resource depletion","Mitigation":"Investigate and optimize the impact of OPA on energy use, implement energy-saving measures based on OPA insights","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, energy management systems, building automation systems","People":"Occupants, facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, municipal authorities"}]}
